summary: RaceMenu Preset File For My Char: Frelia
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3d85c6][size=6][b]-Requirements-[/b][/size]

[b][size=3]-RaceMenu-
-SG Hair (Google It!)-[/size][/b][/color]

[size=3]
[/size][b][color=#e06666][b][size=6]-Vampires-[/size]

[/b][size=3]-Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes-
[/size][size=3]-No Vampire Sunken Face for ECE-[/size][/color]


[color=#c27ba0][size=6]-Installation-[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]Once you have downloaded the file, open and extract the Frelia.slot to a convenient location e.g. desktop.[/size]

[size=3]Then locate your preset folder. (If these folder do not exist, just make them)[/size]

[b][color=#c27ba0][size=3]MODORGANIZER - (ModOrganizer\overwrite\skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets)
SKYRIM DIRECTORY - (Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets)[/size][/color][/b]

[size=3]After that rename the Frelia.slot to a number from 1 - 50 and then simply drag and drop into the folder (Example [/size][b]10.slot[/b][size=3])[/size]
[size=3]

[/size][color=#f6b26b][size=6][b]-Recommendations-[/b][/size]

[b][size=3]-Pretty Lips-
-Nord Race-
-Women Of Skyrim-
-High Res Warpaint-
-Better Makeup for SKSE-
-Familiar Faces (so you can make her a follower)-[/size][/b][/color]


[size=3]Frelia is a Nord, so for the best result I recommend a Nord Character, just my opinion though. 
Feel free to change her appearance to how you want her to look, otherwise enjoy.

Credit to expired6978 for the RaceMenu Mod so that this could be possible :).[/size][/center]
author: Undeadgoblin
